inclusion.criterion: not been suffering from serious chronic illness
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: lab study: V. cholerae seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen

inclusion.criterion: no antehelminthic drug in previous six months

exclusion.criterion: age less than 2 years old and more than 5 years old

notes: Patient has dizziness, severe diarrhea, and abdominal pain since yesterday. He has returned from an international trip few days ago and was living in a camp in Sudan for a month.
